response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it's worth more than what you're willing to pay, but I'm willing to negotiate. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $120. This way, you get a great deal while also acknowledging the value the product holds. Let me know if this works for you.", "product_price": 120}
